nodes.text: A hover taxi was a small, automated transport that could carry at least three passengers. They were used in Mandalore's capital city of Sundari, where they were known as Mandalorian transports. The transports were also used in the Coruscant Underworld, where they were known as Coruscant underworld taxis. On Onderon, modified hover taxis were used by hunters as dalgo-drawn carts.

The hover taxi first appeared in "The Mandalore Plot," a 2010 episode of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' second season. It was first identified in StarWars.com's episode guide for "Lethal Trackdown," another 2010 episode of The Clone Wars' second season.
